column1: This file lists all possible substats and stats for each individual relic set.
The file provides a combined row and rows for each individual character.
The values demonstrate how important each individual stat is for the given set (the higher the more important).
The priority column shows how important this set is for each individual character (starting from 0).
Since this is the single file all characters are listed only in their recommended set.
The stats shown in the first columns are the desired substats.
The main stats are shown in later columns and start with the piece (e.g. Body (main stat))
The number next to the set name shows how many characters are using this set.
Izumo Gensei and Takama Divine Realm (1)
